slogan: Super V Card--Small business card,Big integration ability
whatisSuperCard: Business card as a business contacts tool,the first entrance of people get to know each other.It has an irreplaceable role in the business competition cooperation. Super V Card, as a product of the collision of traditional business cards and  the Internet, aggregate the QR Code, contacts circle, map navigation, mobile phone website, v shop, micro page, micro link, convenient tools and other related function, help enterprise use low cost to implementation 'Internet plus'
mission: Promote the low cost of enterprises to achieve 'Internet +'
allRightsReserved: Super V card, all rights reserved.
location: Soqi founded in June 14, 2005, its headquarters is located in the Xiamen software park. It is a high-tech enterprise focusing on enterprise search.
